themes: Perceived narrowing of eligibility for funding
Need for broader inclusivity in funding recipients
Support for both new and established artists
Impact of rising cost of living on artists
key_phrases: requirements seem to have changed to serve only destitute artists
more broad approach to who receives funding
a certain percentage of new artists or those with no financial means, all the way up to more established artists
still need support to continue working as artists in Austin as the cost of living continues to climb
barriers_identified: Eligibility criteria perceived as too narrow
Rising cost of living in Austin
solutions_proposed: Broaden eligibility to include both new and more established artists
Allocate funding by percentage to different artist groups based on need
